resources.string:
This app is designed to translate English words into native Indian languages such as Hindi, Tamil, Telugu, Kannada, Bengali, Marathi, Gujarati, and Urdu.

In addition to translation, the app helps users understand words better by providing detailed meanings, usage examples, and pronunciation support.

The goal of this app is to make learning and understanding languages easier for students, professionals, and anyone who wants to explore Indian languages in a simple and intuitive way.
